**IMPORTANT:** Please report security vulnerabilities PRIVATELY instead of using this public form.

Email: security@your-org.dev

## Severity
- [ ] Critical (RCE, auth bypass, data leak)
- [ ] High (privilege escalation, crypto weakness)
- [ ] Medium (DOS, information disclosure)
- [ ] Low (defense-in-depth, non-exploitable)

## Vulnerability Type
- [ ] Cryptographic weakness
- [ ] Authentication/Authorization bypass
- [ ] Input validation vulnerability
- [ ] Injection (SQL, command, etc.)
- [ ] Sensitive data exposure
- [ ] Insecure deserialization
- [ ] Other: ___
